infos.info: The studio audience was divided into seven sections representing different subject categories. Questions (submitted by listeners) were offered at auction to the members of the appropriate section, with raises limited to one dollar. The high bid became the prize for that question, and the high bidder was given the opportunity to answer. If he answered correctly, he shared the prize money with the listener who submitted the question; if not, the listener received a consolation prize.'; - Source: Radio's Golden Years by Vincent Terrace
